name: Scarpa Mont Blanc Pro Mountaineering Boots - Men's
description: Lightweight, technical boots suited to modern mixed lines and high alpine routes where responsive feel and warmth are paramount. This is a high-level, do-it-all mountain boot, with details and construction designed to make it warm, waterproof and comfortable. The 3mm suede combined with Schoeller fabric work together with Sock-Fit technology to create a nearly seamless exterior. A stretch GORE-TEX lining and an integrated gaiter work to keep your feet warm and dry so you'll have fewer distractions from the technical challenges and choices at hand.Uppers are 3mm Perwanger leather with HS12 silicone waterproof impregnation and S-Tech fabric.GORE-TEX® Insulated Comfort linings for waterproofing and modest insulation.Speed lacing pulleys on the eyelets are quick to adjust, distribute pressure evenly and hold the foot and ankle snuggly.TPU structured cuff creates a supportive cradle around your ankle.Integrated softshell gaiter keeps snow and debris out. The low-profile interior cuff keeps gaiters in place.Insoles are Pro-Fiber XT20.Sock-Fit Plus construction uses a single piece of S-Tech Schoeller elastic fabric for the tongue, flex-point and collar for a smooth consistent surface.Midsole has a polyurethane insert under the forefoot for stability and increased propulsion.Rubber rand extends up the side of the boot for durability and protection.Rear rand locks the heel securely to create a secure climbing platform.Polyurethane heel insert absorbs shock for during long days of kicking steps, front pointing and slogging through talus.Vibram® Essential AC sole for solid support and torsional stability
